meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jim Wilson Benni Adkins Kathy Chappell Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4426.

div.div: Game data retrieved from an alternate archive.

td.p: Jim Wilson, a high school teacher from Midlothian, Virginia
Benni Adkins, a school lunch lady from Glenpool, Oklahoma
Kathy Chappell, a writer from Burke, Virginia (whose 2-day cash winnings total $10,800)

tr.td: BELOVED POEMS
CLASSIC SITCOM EPISODES
FRUITS & VEGETABLES
WHAT WOULD WE DO WITHOUT...
REMEMBER THE 1980s?
3 LITTLE WORDS
